myCompetitions.title: My Competitions
myCompetitions.subtitle: Manage your tournaments and track progress
myCompetitions.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search terms
myCompetitions.createFirstCompetition: Create your first competition to get started

create.title: Create Competition
create.golfCoursesSubtitle: Add golf courses for each country (at least one per country)
create.coursePendingApproval: This course is pending approval. You won't be able to activate the competition until it's approved.

errors.datesRequired: Start and end dates are required
errors.endDateAfterStart: End date must be after start date
errors.playersMinimum: Number of players must be at least 2

create.partialSuccess: Competition created, but {{failed}} course(s) could not be added: {{courses}}. {{success}} course(s) were added successfully.
create.errorAddingCourses: Competition created, but golf courses could not be added. You can add them manually from the detail page.

detail.creator: Creator

confirmations.activate: Are you sure you want to activate this competition?
confirmations.close-enrollments: Are you sure you want to close enrollments for this competition?
confirmations.start: Are you sure you want to start this competition?
confirmations.complete: Are you sure you want to complete this competition?
confirmations.cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this competition?
confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this competition? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.reject-enrollment: Are you sure you want to reject this enrollment?

errors.golfCoursePendingApproval: Cannot activate competition: Golf course is pending approval
errors.golfCourseRejected: Cannot activate competition: Golf course was rejected
errors.noGolfCourse: Cannot activate competition: No golf course selected
errors.golfCoursesPendingApproval: Cannot activate: These courses are pending approval: {{courses}}
errors.golfCoursesRejected: Cannot activate: These courses were rejected: {{courses}}
errors.noGolfCourses: Cannot activate: No golf courses selected
errors.golfCoursesFetchFailed: Failed to verify golf courses. Please try again.

detail.competitionFull: The competition is full. Maximum number of players ({{max}}) has been reached.

golfCourses.title: Golf Courses ({{count}})
golfCourses.noCourses: No golf courses associated with this competition
golfCourses.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this golf course from the competition?
golfCourses.requestNotAvailable: Requesting new courses is not available in this view. Use the competition creation page.

browse.title: Browse Competitions
browse.subtitle: Discover tournaments to join or explore completed competitions

joinCompetition.noActiveCompetitions: There are no active competitions available to join at the moment

exploreCompetitions.title: Explore Competitions
exploreCompetitions.description: View ongoing tournaments and completed results
exploreCompetitions.noOngoingCompetitions: There are no closed, ongoing, or completed competitions at the moment

errors.alreadyEnrolled: You already have an enrollment request for this competition

success.enrollmentRequested: Enrollment request sent! Check "My Competitions" to track status.

enrollment.teeCategoryHint: Used to assign the right tees in matches
